author: felicity
msg: bug 3317: copy_config() needs to deal with the one-off object copying (in this case the trusted networks object array) _before_ dealing with standard reference copying.

author: akarasulu
msg: o added constraint checks to permission DAO on create() and rename()
o added extra parameter to monitor interface method permissionExists()
o added two extra hasRow() methods to perform a simple check for a permission

author: felicity
msg: bug 3308: turns out that a lot of browsers (IE, Mozilla, Thunderbird, Opera, etc) will allow non-valid URLs such as 'http:www', and 'http:/www', in addition to 'http://www'.  I modified the appropriate parts of the code to handle those.  Moved a section of get_uri_list into its own Util function, and added tests to make sure we can canonify uris properly.
